1_1FNuZtJdubQVu1Mxs65nBVWKuE84pSsoBG.body:
Check out the [subreddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/zeronet/). Also there is a [Zeronet reddit clone](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1J1c7eML6uMwDU4uiKbKRxoqxGP6WMFMvb/) which need a lot of development.

Zeronet is still very new and communities develop organically. Right now a lot of people from Reddit and 4chan is dominating the community and they bring a certain culture. If you want a different one you'll to start a new community. 

The implementation of technology is somewhat important. The technology has as much to do with the social fabric of a community as humans. Read [Bruno Latour](http://www.bruno-latour.fr/sites/default/files/50-MISSING-MASSES-GB.pdf). Serious politically aware people are not necessarily very tech literate and to invite them into Zeronet and stimulate a more intellectual  the discussion, the technology has to be easier to use. 

Right now Zeronet is a playground. You're right the is no clear ideological focus here. That could change if the tools become mature enough to be interesting for other than first movers and technophiles. 

And looking at the latest discussion on [HackerNews](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=14041077) it seems like Zeronet need a lot of work to reach maturity.

> [nekololi](#comment_37_1FzZsDQdh8wk71bDLxURPzmAt2FXehoNAB): what you describe is a social problem that exists everywhere throughout the internet. it cannot be fixed through software. you have to change the way people think about and interact with computer technology.i also cannot imagine how zeronet could be made any easier than it currently is. you plug it in and it works.

You can not make a strict distinction between a social problem and a technological problem as technology form the social life and and the social form technology. These two things are interconnected. You should familiarize yourself with Bruno Latour if you wish to work with technology: http://www.bruno-latour.fr/sites/default/files/50-MISSING-MASSES-GB.pdf

1_1FfxZY6BWRHFxjMWa8BMtkmhQeWdQuNteL.body:
Et heftigt Ildstænk mod det haarde Blaa
staar Middagssolen hed i strittende Straalen.
Den tørre Muldbrink er saa pulvergraa,
Insekter summer over Agerkaalen.

Den stille Dag sig strækker vidt og højt.
Omkring mig Myg og Sommerfugle svirrer.
Fra Luft og Løv der pibler klare Fløjt.
I glarfin Dis de fjerne Flader dirrer.
 — —
I Søens blanke, afmagtstunge Vand
staar Fisken stiv og dum fra Gab til Hale.
Nu slog den Snuden mod den bratte Strand
og nøs og dasked hen i Dybets Dale.
 
Der ligger den paa Bund i Søen klar,
og fra dens Snude gaar tilvejrs en Boble:
den stirrer op mod Overfladens Glar,
hvor Solen gynger som en ildgul Gople.
 — —
En Bondepige sidder i en Grøft -
med korte Særkeærmer, nøgne Arme.
Man ser det øverste af Barmens Kløft -
der ligger Draaber, Sol og Kødets Varme. — -
 
Det er saa varmt og godt ved Muld og Strand.
Det er en Sommerdag i Danmarks Land.

nedspildt spruttende af syre
 og med alle tanker antændt fægtende
              i delte mandariner
           skilt og fuldmoden laprende
        i grønt lys og flugt
                 med ligegyldige anslag
                     suget gennem minuttet
                  sydende af saft og nedspildt
              fra hinkesten og mandariner
          hoppende på blomsten
              i kejtede kredse over
                  spejlblanke vandpytter ind
                         i et ansigt af røg og ingen
                         ild antændt spruttende
                     af mandariner men et ansigt
                 rygende af syre blink
             og ætsende i nogens hornhinder

topic.body: There seems to be a steady supply of crazy people with all kinds of stupid Jewish conspiracy theories going on. Where the hell do they come from? Did someone allow Zeronet to be accessed at some insane asylum?
topic.title: Where does all the jew-hating nutjobs come from?
